channel.title: Blank Source Max Level
channel.description:
[s]Hey Moparss, I have a question.. I use a 317 Blank source and this is what happens : I changed the max level to 99 but still it is possible to reach lvl 100? I used a tutorial for this so maybe he/she didn't explain it well so here is what i changed : In Source/client.java i changed "for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) { " to "for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { " But still he is reaching lvl 100 and yes I used the compiler and yes he said there was no problem.. I hope someone could help me, it is not necessary at the moment but I want it fixed so fast as possible.. Thanks for reading =D[/s]
Fixed it!!

item.title: Blank Source Max Level
item.dc:creator: @Fox_Mylan Fox Mylan
item.description:
@Fox_Mylan wrote:

Hey Moparss, I have a question…
I use a 317 Blank source and this is what happens :
I changed the max level to 99 but still it is possible to reach lvl 100?
I used a tutorial for this so maybe he/she didn’t explain it well so here is what i changed : In Source/client.java i changed "for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) { " to "for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { " But still he is reaching lvl 100 and yes I used the compiler and yes he said there was no problem… I hope someone could help me, it is not necessary at the moment but I want it fixed so fast as possible… Thanks for reading =D

Fixed it!!
